title: One Bedroom Apartment in a Private beach Community
posting_body: ['One Bedroom Apartment with a office and fireplace.', 'This is a small apartment perfect for a person or couple starting out living small and who are ok with limited cooking.', 'The front of the home is your private entrance.', 'The bedroom has a double size closet with built in storage for clothes.', 'The bed platform has storage under the bed.', 'There are also two closets in the main area.', 'There is also an office / half kitchen with a lot of storage for the office and kitchen supplies.', ' There is no oven, however there is a wet bar with a refrigerator and microwave.', 'There is also a separate half kitchen with a second refrigerator, countertop oven and an inductive hot plate built in with a vented hood.', 'The apartment is on the first floor and front of the house.', 'The front door will be your private entrance.', 'There are Oak floors throughout.', 'No smoking / No pets /', 'No loud music /', 'No parties / No drama.', 'Rent is $1600/month plus utilities, heat and electric budgeted at $200 per month.', 'Water and internet are included.', 'To Move in you will need one month rent and one month security.', 'PLEASE READ', 'WHEN RESPONDING TO THIS POST PLEASE PROVIDE YOUR NAME, PHONE NUMBER, PRESENT OCCUPATION, INCOME, AND HOW LONG EMPLOYED.', 'YOUR IDEAL MOVE-IN DATE, PRESENT RENTAL SITUATION, TIME FRAME YOU ARE LOOKING TO RENT.', 'SORRY I WILL NOT RESPOND TO EMAILS WHICH ASK QUESTIONS THAT ARE ALREADY ANSWERED IN THE LISTING OR EMAILS THAT DO NOT CONTAIN THE REQUESTED INFO.', 'PLEASE DO NOT ASK IF THE RENTAL IS STILL AVAILABLE.', 'IF IT’S LISTED IT IS STILL AVALIABLE.', 'If you are a highly respectful, very clean, and quiet person looking for a premium living situation, please email me with the requested personal information and any questions you may have.', 'THANKS !', 'I WILL NOT REEPOND TO LINKS TO ANY SITES!', 'Close commute to Patchogue, Medford, Oakdale, Sayville, Blue point, Bayport, Holbrook, Bohemia, Bayshore, Stony Brook, East Setauket, Port Jefferson, Hauppauge, Brookhaven, Shirley, Center Moriches, Islip Terrace, East Islip, Selden, Farmingville, Ronkonkoma']
